cpl.readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Markdown tiddlers (text/x-markdown) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-markdown
cpl.name: CodeMirror Mode Markdown
title: Plugin_202303171221159
